text: Today I had a joyful run but even better news I received the  #AstraZeneca #COVID19 #vaccine. It was very easy, safe & I need to say I am feeling awesome. The vaccines are helping to save lives and the best vaccine is the first one offered to you.#VaccinesSaveLives 💉🙏🏼🙌✅ https://t.co/ZbG7afKbrC
